titleStmt.title: The Lord Chancellor of Scotland his speech to the King in Newcastle, July, 1646 As it was sent up by a faithfull hand from thence. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Loudoun, John Campbell, Earl of, 1598-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for Rich. Tomlines at the Sunne in Pie-Corner,

notesStmt.note: The Lord Chancellor of Scotland = John Campbell, Earl of Loudoun.
This edition has "Rich. Tomlines" in imprint.
Copy has some print fade and print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University Library.
